effects.display_string: Set: Tidal Waves increases the healing of affected spells by 10%.
(4) Set: Tidal Waves is 80% more effective and reduces the mana cost of affected spells by 8%.

Set: Tidal Waves increases the healing of affected spells by 10%.
(4) Set: Tidal Waves is 80% more effective and reduces the mana cost of affected spells by 8%.

(2) Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 450,027.
(4) Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant 6,146 primary stat for 20 sec.

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Increases your Intellect by 10% and your Stamina by 15% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,099 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 58,473 Nature damage over 8 sec.
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.
